EdgeCaseAnnotations.ZeroValueDeposits: Not specifically handled; depositing zero Ether is not explicitly restricted.
EdgeCaseAnnotations.BalanceOverflowInIncreaseLockTime: The increaseLockTime function could cause a lock time overflow if too high a value is provided, causing a wrap-around.

CommonAttackPatterns.ArithmeticOverflow: Without safe math, increaseLockTime could lead to an overflow if an extremely large value is provided, resetting the lock time.

RecoveryMechanisms: None implemented; no emergency function to pause or reverse deposits or withdrawals.
